Package com.badlogic.gdx.graphics

Interface Summary
Mesh A Mesh, either indexed or non-indexed.
Pixmap A Pixmap represents a plattform specific bitmap.
RenderListener A RenderListener can be hooked to a Application and will receive setup, render and dispose events.
Texture A Texture represents a bitmap to be applied to a Mesh.
 

Class Summary
Font A font returns glyph bitmaps for characters as well as some metrics.
OrthographicCamera An orthographic camera having a position and a scale value for zooming.
PerspectiveCamera A perspective camera, having a position, a direction an up vector, a near plane, a far plane and a field of view.
 

Enum Summary
Font.HorizontalAlign Horizontal text alignement
Font.VerticalAlign Vertical text alignement
Mesh.PrimitiveType Enum of supported rendering primitives.
OrthographicCamera.Side  
Pixmap.Format Different pixel formats.
